articles.title: Scrap for cash before coins: Researchers show Bronze Age witnessed revolution in small change across Europe - Science Daily
articles.description: How did people living in the Bronze Age manage their finances before money became widespread? Researchers ave discovered that bronze scrap found in hoards in Europe circulated as a currency. These pieces of scrap -- which might include swords, axes, and jewel…

articles.title: Xiaomi's market share in Europe surpasses Apple to rank 2nd in Q1 - Global Times - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: (May 6): Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi's market share in Europe has surpassed Apple in the first quarter, ranking the second in the smartphone market, according to Zeng Xuezhong, vice president of Xiaomi, Global Times reported.According to Zeng's post on We…

articles.title: Real outclassed as loss raises fresh doubts around old guard - SuperSport
articles.description: Real Madrid were not just beaten but outplayed, their defeat by Chelsea on Wednesday clear enough to spell the end of a team that has gone on and on but can no longer match the best in Europe.
